remove_profile-message: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
profile_was_deleted: You can recover your account within a year, just log in like you used to. We hope you come back soon.

delete_profile.title_1: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
delete_profile.title_2: We're sad you're leaving. Why do you want to delete your account?
delete_profile.title_3: Please type your current password to delete your account.
delete_profile.top_content: This will disable your profile,which means you'll miss all those weird, unique lifegoal ideas we add every day.If you'd rather just take a break or strat over, you can
delete_profile.goals: Make all your goals invisible,hide it from others
delete_profile.something_else_text1: Bucketlist127 is used by thousands of people around the world to dream organized.We have a
delete_profile.something_else_text2: on how to make the most of Bucket List 172.
delete_profile.many_notify_text: You can limit the number of notifications you receive from us
delete_profile.not_expected: Bucket List 127 is just not what I expected
delete_profile.not_expected_text: Let us know what you expected from the service below and we'll be sure to take your views on board
delete_profile.done_everything: I've done everything on my bucket list
delete_profile.done_everything_text: That's impossible dude. We were just kidding. You will have life goals until you're alive.
delete_profile.placeholder: Give us more details if you'd like to
delete_profile.other_placeholder: Show you creativity with your feedback
delete_profile.forgot_pass: Click here if you forgot your password

setting.invalid_user_name: Name cannot be symbols or numbers. Please, enter a valid name!

message_on_top_of_the_page: Congrats! You have successfully completed the goal!
facebook_post_text: I have completed another goal on Bucket List 127. This is how dreams turn into memories! Itâ€™s time to take on some more.

goal.friend_inner_description: Description:If you are interested in your goalfriends' interests and want to see their activities and goals, visit their page and get aware of the action he/she takes up.
goal.friends_description: Start over and see the list of your goalfriends with whom you have common goals. Be active and see the people that have the same taste and interest.
goal.view_description: See what the idea/goal contains in its inner page. It may have a list of pictures, videos, success stories and comments. Success stories inform you of the experience people have had about it. Leave you own comment and express your thought!
goal.stories_description: Check out Bucket List 127 Stories, where you can find crazy and motivational stories, creative articles and much more. Let Bucket List 127 lead you to success
goal.list_description: The list of ideas that will help you to research awesome goals to add to your own Bucketlist page. You may combine any idea with your own goals to make your bucketlist creative and imaginative.
goal.agree: By checking you suggest your goal to be listed in the Ideas list
goal.description_title:
Place a hash character (#) in front of a word or unspaced phrase in title and description to convert it into hashtag.
You can use simple Markdown elements for emphasizing a snippet of text with a heavier font-weight and italics: **bold**, *italics*
goal.description_title_mob: Place a hash character (#) in front of a word or unspaced phrase in title and description to convert it into hashtag.
goal.search_description: Here is the list of goal you searched for. Search bucketlist, share ideas and examples from your goalfriends. Search Things To Do In Bucket Lists.
goal.successfully_add: Your idea has been added successfully.
goal.is_dream: A goal without target date is a dream ...
goal.add_description: The first step to dream big is to create a bucketlist. If you want to fulfill your dreams, experience life goals before you die, start just now by creating goals.
goal.type: Type in a youtube or vimeo link in the field
goal.in_proces: An active goal is a goal in process
goal.deside: Be better prepared to decide on goals
goal.not_found: Sorry, we couldn't find anything.
goal.not_found3: or you can explore other ideas:
goal.completed_text: If you believe your Goal is still Active, you can undo it
goal.active_text: If you accomplished your Goal, just mark it
goal.private_text: You created this Goal only for your Bucketlist
goal.invisible_text: You can make the Goal invisible for other users
goal.visible_text: Show or hide your goal from others
goal.missed_deadline: You missed your deadline, please set new one
goal.create_goal: CONGRATULATIONS, YOUR GOAL HAS BEEN SUCCESSFULLY
goal.create_idea: CONGRATULATIONS, YOUR IDEA HAS BEEN SUCCESSFULLY CREATED AND ADDED AS A GOAL
goal.empty_draft: Currently there are no draft goals in your draft list
goal.empty_private_ideas: Currently there are no Private goals in your Private goal list

was_created.public: Your goal has been successfully created
was_created.private: Your private goal has been successfully created

goal.was_deleted: Your goal has been successfully removed

activities.title: Bucket List 127-Activity
activities.description: It is the list of goals that your goalfriends have listed, done or completed. Be aware of your goalfriends' activity, it may end up on yours.

ideas_near_by_allow: Allow your Browser Location Service or enter your location
homepage_title:
The goal is to have memories,
not only dreams!
homepage_list_title: Discover thousands of great ideas for your Bucket List
homepage_description: Have your list of goals for life and see how much more you would achieve over what you could possibly imagine.
reminder_message: Your goal deadline is close to end.Do your best to meet the deadline.
progress_bad: Get a move on! You are falling behind your goals.
progress_good: Good job! You are in sync with your projected goals.
progress_excellent: Excellent! You are outperforming! You can do more. Discover thousands of great ideas for your Bucket List.

active.not_have: You have no goals, please, start

home_ideas.title: Bucket List 127 - The goal is to have memories, not only dreams!
home_ideas.description: Have your list of goals for life and see how much more you would achieve over what you could possibly imagine.

contacr_us.message_title: Thank you, your message has been sent.
contacr_us.message_content: We will get in touch with you as soon as possible.

my_bucket_list.title: Bucket List 127-My Bucketlist
my_bucket_list.description: Look at the things you did and the things you are about to do. See the list of your own goals, manage and share your own 'bucketlist'.
my_bucket_list.doing_here: What are you doing here? Come on,
my_bucket_list.complete: Itâ€™s time to act and complete
my_bucket_list.filter: There are no goals to correspond to this priority combination
my_bucket_list.completed_description: See the list of goals you have to completed. Get inspired of them and continue working hard to achieve your goals and make your dreams come true.
my_bucket_list.active_description: See the list of your active goals. Be aware of the deadline and completion date of your goals and do your best to meet the scheduled date.
my_bucket_list.dream_description: If you have created a goal but haven't set a deadline it automatically becomes a dream. No completion date, no scheduled date! You are just dreaming.
my_bucket_list.iu_description: Goals differ in their priority. Some goals are really important and urgent and some are not. Here is the list of goals which are both important and urgent.
my_bucket_list.noiu_description: Goals differ in their priority. Some goals are really important and urgent and some are not. Here is the list of goals which are not important, but urgent.
my_bucket_list.inou_description: Goals differ in their priority. Some goals are really important and urgent and some are not. Here is the list of goals which are important but not urgent.
my_bucket_list.noinou_description: Goals differ in their priority. Some goals are really important and urgent and some are not. Here is the list of goals which are neither important, nor urgent.

draft.title: Bucket List 127-Drafts
draft.description: If you hesitate to start a goal and still think over to create it or not, don't delay. Draft list gives you an opportunity to see the goals you have worked on but not yet published.

private_ideas.title: Bucket List 127-Private Ideas
private_ideas.description: If you want to have a look at your private ideas, here you can see your own ideas list that will remind you of your activities.

mobile_modal:
Bucket List 127 is available everywhere!
Download the app, discover great features and explore over thousand exciting ideas for your goals.
social_post_text: I just started my Bucket List: so far the best tool to make sure I have memories, not just dream;) Join Bucket List 127, it's amazing!
dream: No deadline, No goal! You are just dreaming
drag_drop: You can upload up to 6 images
upload:

The maximum size of an image must not exceed 4MB.

leaderboard.position_text: Want to rise on the leaderboard? Devote more time to your Bucket List.
leaderboard.travelerText: Traveler is a person who has seen the world more than users does
leaderboard.innovatorText: Innovator is a person who has suggested a lot of goal ideas that we have accepted and shared
leaderboard.motivatorText: Mentor is a person who has inspired a lot of people, with his motivational success stories
